entry.title: Frictionless Summit
entry.summary: On March 28th we hosted the first Frictionless Summit to bring together maintainers, users, and contributors to discuss challenges, priorities, and governance for the project moving forward.

entry.title: The Tech We Want: Join us to discuss the future of Frictionless Data in a 3-hour online summit
entry.summary: At the summit, we want to promote successful cases and projects using Frictionless, and collectively discuss how such a long-running project adapts to the current context and Open Knowledgeâ€™s current vision of technology.
